# The Sigmoid function

```{r}
library(rTorch)
library(ggplot2)
```

Using PyTorch functions:

```{r sigmoid}
x <- torch$range(-5., 5., 0.1)
y <- torch$sigmoid(x)

df <- data.frame(x = x$numpy(), sx = y$numpy())
df

ggplot(df, aes(x = x, y = sx)) + 
    geom_point()
```

Plot the sigmoid function using an R function:

```{r, fig.asp=1}
sigmoid = function(x) {
   1 / (1 + exp(-x))
}

x <- seq(-5, 5, 0.01)
plot(x, sigmoid(x), col = 'blue', cex = 0.5)
```
